person.persName: James Henry Arnold (Owsley County, Kentucky soldier and tailor, 2nd Lieut. 3 Forks Battalion)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky tailor and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Routhford and Sarah Arnold. Married to Harriet Arnold. Father of Eudocia Arnold, Samuel P. Arnold, Stephen Arnold, Green A. Arnold, Alexander Arnold and Charles C. Arnold. Served as 2nd Lieutenant in Company B, Three Forks Battalion, mustered in August 27, 1864 and mustered out July 17, 1865. Occupation listed as tailor between 1860 and 1918.
